mapper.select: SELECT c.type, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.usergroup_id) userGroupId FROM `t_usergroup_user_map` a inner join t_usergroup b on b.id=a.usergroup_id inner JOIN sys_role c on c.ROLE_ID=b.ROLE_ID and c.type='audit' where a.USERNAME=#{applyUserId} GROUP BY c.type

select 'vir' operType, GROUP_CONCAT(a.id) hostIdStr from t_virtualmachine a where a.type!='kvm'
and a.user=#{applyUserId}
and exists ( SELECT 1 FROM act_hi_procinst b INNER JOIN act_hi_actinst c on c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where exists (select 1 from t_usergroup_user_map d where d.USERNAME=c.ASSIGNEE_ and FIND_IN_SET(d.usergroup_id, #{audit})) and b.BUSINESS_KEY_=a.appNo )
union all select 'host' operType, GROUP_CONCAT(a.id) hostIdStr from t_hostmachine a where 1=1
and exists ( select 1 from t_virtualmachine b where b.hostmachine_id=a.id and b.user=#{applyUserId} )
and exists ( select 1 from t_virtualmachine b where b.hostmachine_id=a.id and exists ( SELECT 1 FROM act_hi_procinst c INNER JOIN act_hi_actinst d on d.PROC_INST_ID_=c.PROC_INST_ID_ where exists (select 1 from t_usergroup_user_map e where e.USERNAME=d.ASSIGNEE_ and FIND_IN_SET(e.usergroup_id, #{audit})) and c.BUSINESS_KEY_=b.appNo ) )
union all select 'phys' operType, GROUP_CONCAT(a.id) hostIdStr from t_virtualmachine a where a.type='kvm'
and a.user=#{applyUserId}
and exists ( SELECT 1 FROM act_hi_procinst b INNER JOIN act_hi_actinst c on c.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where exists (select 1 from t_usergroup_user_map d where d.USERNAME=c.ASSIGNEE_ and FIND_IN_SET(d.usergroup_id, #{audit})) and b.BUSINESS_KEY_=a.appNo )

SELECT c.cpuUseNum, ifnull(sum(a.cpu), 0) cpuTotalNum, c.memUseNum, ifnull(sum(a.memory), 0) memTotalNum, c.storeUseNum, ifnull(sum(a.localdisk), 0) storeTotalNum FROM t_hostmachine a inner join (SELECT ifnull(sum(b.cpu), 0) cpuUseNum, ifnull(sum(b.memory), 0) memUseNum, ifnull(sum(b.mount_disk_size), 0) storeUseNum FROM t_virtualmachine b where FIND_IN_SET(b.hostmachine_id, #{hostIdStr})) c where FIND_IN_SET(a.id, #{hostIdStr})
select a.id, a.name, a.ip, a.cpu, a.memory, a.mount_disk_size mountDiskSize from t_virtualmachine a where FIND_IN_SET(a.id, #{hostIdStr})
